name: Easy Highlight Text
author: Jonathan Melgoza

sections.description: This plugin allows you highlight any text, let you choose from 6 different types: success, error, tip, warning, simple and message. Just add the class “eht-success” and so on.. to any span tag and enjoy.
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

  1. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  2. Add a span tag with the class you want from the list

for example:

an important message

list:
eht-success class.
eht-error class.
eht-tip class.
eht-warning class.
eht-simple class.
eht-message class.

and it’s all.

Enjoy.
sections.faq:
Can i put the class in a div tag?

Yes, you can do it.
sections.changelog:
1.0

  • First version of Easy Highlight Text
  • Added 6 classes to choose
